trans-unit.source: A tram (also known as tramcar; and in North America known as streetcar, trolley or trolley car) is a rail vehicle which runs on tracks along public urban streets, and also sometimes on a segregated right of way.
trans-unit.target: V brněnském hantecu se tramvaji říká šalina (zkomolením německého slovního spojení elektrische Linie [elektryše líne][1]) nebo šmirgl, naproti tomu v Ostravě se běžně užívá výraz tramvajka.

trans-unit.source: A tram (also known as tramcar; and in North America known as streetcar, trolley or trolley car) is a rail vehicle which runs on tracks along public urban streets, and also sometimes on a segregated right of way.
trans-unit.target: Šalina je v dnešní terminologii vozidlo nebo vlak tramvajové dráhy.
